>
[Steam Winch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1158)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Steam" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=415" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 89</row>

**Price** 425 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** operated with two hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This hefty winch is powered by a small steam engine and includes a 100 ft. length of steel cable, which enables you to haul a heavier load than you could with a hand cranked winch or [comealong](/Equipment.aspx?ID=865). A steam winch allows you to slowly pull a heavy load (usually up to 50 Bulk) along a flat surface or up and down a vertical expanse.

 Attaching a steam winch to a device takes three Interact actions, while starting the winch (and getting it warm enough to operate) takes 10 minutes. Once in operation, a steam winch requires regular maintenance to function. Every twenty minutes, the boiler must be refilled and heat levels maintained.
